nodes.text: The Malastare Narrows were a location in regards to the planet Malastare. They were blockaded by Admiral Trench of the Corporate Alliance as part of the Battle of Malastare Narrows of 34 BBY.

Although the "Malastare Narrows" were first mentioned as part of the name of the Battle of Malastare Narrows, they were not identified as an actual location until the publication of The Essential Guide to Warfare. Their canonical significance has yet to be clarified.
